PinCushion.SETTINGS.AboutAppH: Displays additional info about Pin Cushion
PinCushion.SETTINGS.ShowJournalPreviewH: Shows a Journal preview when hovering over a map pin
PinCushion.SETTINGS.PreviewTypeH: The type of Journal preview to show (HTML or Text snippet)
PinCushion.SETTINGS.PreviewMaxLengthH: **TEXT PREVIEW ONLY** How many characters should the text preview show?
PinCushion.SETTINGS.PreviewDelayH: How long before preview appears (in milliseconds)
PinCushion.SETTINGS.DefaultJournalPermissionH: The default permission journal entries will be created with
PinCushion.SETTINGS.DefaultJournalFolderH: The default folder journal entries will be created in when creating Map Pins with a double-click
PinCushion.SETTINGS.EnableBackgroundlessPinsH: Removes the background box from map notes.
PinCushion.SETTINGS.ShowJournalImageByDefaultN: Show by default the icon image of the journal on the map note.
PinCushion.SETTINGS.ShowJournalImageByDefaultH: If a image is set on the journal by default is the first image set from Pin Cushion
PinCushion.SETTINGS.PlayerIconAutoOverrideH: Newly created notes will have player-only icons enabled automatically.
PinCushion.SETTINGS.PlayerIconPathDefaultH: The default icon used for player-only icons
PinCushion.SETTINGS.noteGMH: Add the ability for Note tooltips to be configured so that GMs see different text to Players. So secret information can be displayed to GMs whilst players see the 'public' information about the Note.
PinCushion.SETTINGS.revealedNotesN: Add an option to have a 'revealed' state on scene Notes.
PinCushion.SETTINGS.revealedNotesH: When enabled, then the 'revealed' state will be used to determine if the Note is visible to players. (The default Foundry VTT behavior is for Notes to be visible to players only if the linked document is accessible by the player.)
PinCushion.SETTINGS.revealedNotesTintColorN: Add an option to have a 'revealed' state on scene Notes.
PinCushion.SETTINGS.revealedNotesTintColorH: is an option to set the tint colour of the Note icon to indicate if the linked document is reachable or not (if the Note has no linked document, then it will always be displayed in the 'unreachable' tint).
PinCushion.SETTINGS.revealedNotesTintColorLinkH: For players, the RGB value to be used to tint scene Notes if they have a reachable link (if left blank then the tint, if any, will remain unchanged).  For GMs, this is the initial Icon Tint set during import
PinCushion.SETTINGS.revealedNotesTintColorNotLinkN: Note Tint Colour when not linked
PinCushion.SETTINGS.revealedNotesTintColorNotLinkH: For players, the RGB value to be used to tint scene Notes if they do not have a reachable link (if left blank then the tint, if any, will remain unchanged).  For GMs, this is the initial Icon Tint set during import
PinCushion.SETTINGS.SpecificFolderH: Make sense only with the module setting 'Default Journal Entry Folder' set with value 'Specific folder'
PinCushion.SETTINGS.enableJournalThumbnailForGMsN: Enable Sidebar Journal Images for GM Users
PinCushion.SETTINGS.enableJournalThumbnailForPlayer: Enable Sidebar Journal Images for Player Users
PinCushion.SETTINGS.fontSizeH: Override the base text size for the journal entry display. Example: 1.5rem.
PinCushion.SETTINGS.maxWidthH: The maximum width the entry display can grow to before it'll force wrapping.
PinCushion.SETTINGS.reset.name: Reset settings to default
PinCushion.SETTINGS.reset.label: Reset Settings To Default
PinCushion.SETTINGS.reset.hint: This will reset all of the settings of back to the active game system's default.
PinCushion.SETTINGS.debug.name: Enable debugging
PinCushion.SETTINGS.debug.label: Prints debug messages to the console
PinCushion.SETTINGS.dialogs.resetsettings.title: Reset Module Settings
PinCushion.SETTINGS.dialogs.resetsettings.content: Are you sure you want to reset all of the module settings to the current system's defaults? THIS CANNOT BE UNDONE!
PinCushion.Tooltip.Placement.title: Tooltip Placement
PinCushion.Tooltip.Color.title: Tooltip Color
PinCushion.Tooltip.ForceRemove.title: Tooltip Force remove when not on hover. Note: do not use this if you need a interactive note.
PinCushion.Name: Name:
PinCushion.CreateMissingFoldersC:
Create a Journal Entry folder for each player?
This ensures that each player has their own folder for entries to be created in.
PinCushion.PlayerIconHint: Enable to override the icon players will see.
PinCushion.AllowPlayerNotes: Players also need the Core Foundry Permission "{permission}" to create map pins.
PinCushion.ShowImage: Show on the tooltip linked Image instead of text ?
PinCushion.ShowImageExplicitSource: Select and show on the tooltip a explicit Image instead linked image
PinCushion.PreviewAsTextSnippet: Show the preview as text snippet
